0.text: Innate: Lux's abilities apply a mark to enemies hit that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits. Lux's basic attacks and  Final Spark consume the mark to deal 20 − 190 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.
0.html:
Innate: Lux's abilities apply a mark to enemies hit that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits.

Lux's basic attacks and Final Spark consume the mark to deal 20 − 190 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.

0.text: 20 − 190 (based on level)

markedPassages: Final Spark
20 − 190 (based on level)

0.text: Active: Lux shoots a sphere of light in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit and  roots them for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Lux shoots a sphere of light in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit and roots them for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: roots

0.text: RANGE: * 1175

Active: Lux throws her wand in the target direction that homes back to her after reaching maximum range. Allied champions hit by the wand gain a  shield for 2.5 seconds, which can stack up to 2 times, stacking with the previous shield and refreshing its duration.
0.html: Active: Lux throws her wand in the target direction that homes back to her after reaching maximum range. Allied champions hit by the wand gain a shield for 2.5 seconds, which can stack up to 2 times, stacking with the previous shield and refreshing its duration.
markedPassages: shield

1.text: Lux receives the shield upon throwing the wand and upon its return.
1.html: Lux receives the shield upon throwing the wand and upon its return.

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 1100

Active: Lux sends a lucent singularity to the target location that lasts 5 seconds, granting  sight of the area and  slowing nearby enemies.  Lucent Singularity can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.
0.html:
Active: Lux sends a lucent singularity to the target location that lasts 5 seconds, granting sight of the area and slowing nearby enemies.

Lucent Singularity can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.
markedPassages: sight
slowing

1.text: Recast: Lux detonates the singularity, dealing magic damage to enemies within. If Lucent Singularity was recast while in flight, it will detonate upon arrival.
1.html: Recast: Lux detonates the singularity, dealing magic damage to enemies within. If Lucent Singularity was recast while in flight, it will detonate upon arrival.

2.text: The slow lingers for 1 second after leaving the area. Enemies hit by Lucent Singularity's detonation are also slowed by the same amount for 1 second.
2.html: The slow lingers for 1 second after leaving the area. Enemies hit by Lucent Singularity's detonation are also slowed by the same amount for 1 second.

0.text: RANGE:  3400
Active: Lux fires a massive laser in a line in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  reveals them for 1.5 seconds, as well as granting  sight of the surrounding area.
0.html: Active: Lux fires a massive laser in a line in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and reveals them for 1.5 seconds, as well as granting sight of the surrounding area.
markedPassages: reveals
sight

0.text: Innate: Lux's abilities apply a mark to enemies hit that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits. Lux's basic attacks and  Final Spark consume the mark to deal 20 − 190 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.

Lux's basic attacks and Final Spark consume the mark to deal 20 − 190 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.

Lucent Singularity can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.
